title: mAsKs cAuSe cOmPaSsIoN, Ellen Degenerate? 8.4.20
itunes:title: mAsKs cAuSe cOmPaSsIoN, Ellen Degenerate? 8.4.20
description:
In episode 686, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Marcella Arguello to discuss the anti-mask movement, celebrities fleeing the United States, Ellen DeGeneres feeling betrayed by the crew she tortured for speaking out, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Mom Influencers on Instagram Are Spreading Anti-Mask Propaganda
  2. 5 Questions: Stanford scientists on COVID-19 mask guidelines
  3. Still Confused About Masks? Here’s the Science Behind How Face Masks Prevent Coronavirus
  4. Anti-mask protesters' new weapon: wearing masks that offer no COVID-19 protection
  5. ‘Not handling the pandemic well’: Man fires at officers with AK-47 after refusing to wear a mask, police say
  6. Zac Efron to Possibly Join Long Line of Rich People Fleeing the United States
  7. Tom Hanks and Rita Wilson are officially Greek citizens
  8. Ellen DeGeneres ‘Wants Out’ of Her Show Amid New Claims, Feels ‘Betrayed’
  9. WATCH: Godtet - Max Lush

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
